articles.description: The US health agency CDC reduced the isolation period to five days for asymptomatic patients of Covid-19. It has now revised it to clarify that to end isolation, the person should have no fever for 24 hours.

articles.title: 1,270 Omicron Cases, Most In Maharashtra (450); 16,764 Fresh Covid Cases - NDTV
articles.description: The fast-spreading Omicron variant has spread to 23 states in India and now 1,270 people have been infected with the new COVID-19 strain. The new variant has been labeled as "highly transmissible" by experts.
articles.content: • Maharashtra - which has reported the most number of coronavirus cases - has 450 cases of the new variant. 125 people have recovered in the state so far, according to the Health Ministry.
